name: cv
description: Generator for my CV which is using the [jsonresume](https://jsonresume.org/) node app.

scripts.preview: npx resume-cli export exports/so-preview.html --resume resume.json --theme ./themes/my-stackoverflow && npx resume-cli export exports/so-preview.pdf --resume resume.json --theme ./themes/my-stackoverflow
scripts.preview-original: npx resume-cli export exports/so-original.html --resume resume.json --theme stackoverflow && npx resume-cli export exports/so-original.pdf --resume resume.json --theme stackoverflow
